prompts: Create a sleek, blue feline Pokémon with psychic abilities and a mystical aura.
I want a Pokémon that resembles a small cat with striking green eyes and a flowing tail.
Generate a psychic-type Pokémon that can communicate telepathically and has a unique color scheme.
Make an elegant Pokémon with a blue and white color palette that embodies grace and intelligence.
Imagine a Pokémon with a majestic tail and psychic powers, perfect for battles and training.
Design a cute, small Pokémon that has a unique blue fur pattern and psychic abilities.
Show me a Pokémon that looks like a mystical cat with a playful personality and psychic powers.
